snippet: Censors have been hard at work taking down posts about the crime on social media that deviate from the terse account by the official news agency....
abstract: Chinese censors have worked to suppress media coverage of mass killing of 19 people in mountain village of Yema, even removing posts in social media; suspect Yang Qingpei has been arrested.

byline.contributor: Kiki Zhao and Emily Feng contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: Censors have been hard at work taking down posts about the crime on social media that deviate from the terse account by the official news agency.

headline.main: Chinese News Outlets Play Down Killings of 19 in Mountain Village
headline.print_headline: China Stifles Coverage of Remote Mass Killing
